articles.description: The controversy surrounding Red Bull boss Christian Horner is "driving people apart", says the father of the team's F1 champion Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Jos Verstappen says controversy 'driving team apart'

articles.description: Liverpool dug deep to find a late winner at Nottingham Forest and the evidence shows they will fight to the end in the Premier League title race.
articles.title: 'It's never over' - Liverpool will fight to the end

articles.description: Jude Bellingham is sent off for complaining after the final whistle denies him a winning goal for Real Madrid in a dramatic game at Valencia.
articles.title: Bellingham sent off after full-time in Real draw

articles.description: Great Britain's Molly Caudery says her dreams have come true after the 23-year-old wins pole vault gold at the World Athletics Indoor Championship
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Molly Caudery achieves 'dream' gold on emotional night

articles.description: Mercedes driver George Russell summed up what many people in Formula 1 felt after Max Verstappen's imperious victory for Red Bull in the season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Bahrain Grand Prix: Max Verstappen sets chilling tone for season

articles.description: Nathan Lyon takes six for 65 as Australia secure a 172-run win over New Zealand in the first Test in Wellington.
articles.title: Spinner Lyon leads way as Australia thrash NZ

articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James becomes the first NBA player to reach 40,000 career regular-season points.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James passes 40,000-point mark but LA Lakers lose to Denver Nuggets

articles.description: Nottingham Forest referee analyst Mark Clattenburg bemoans decision in the build-up to Liverpool's winner on Saturday.
articles.title: Forest's Clattenburg bemoans officiating in Liverpool loss

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter reaches her first WTA 500 final at the San Diego Open by beating American Emma Navarro 6-3 6-1.
articles.title: Katie Boulter: British number one reaches her first WTA 500 final in San Diego

articles.description: Josh Kerr overcomes emotion and his rivals to claim a second world title in nine months as Glasgow hails home hero.
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Josh Kerr sets Team GB Olympic Games marker
